name: Synthia
description: This specification describes a tabular format that describes a nationwide synthetic population of households and persons called the 2010 U.S. Synthesized Population dataset, which was developed by RTI International. The synthetic population is a detailed, spatially-explicit representation of the socio-demographic distribution of the U.S. population in a microdata form. The data are distributed in a compressed file containing a series of ASCII files with comma separated value.
